entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
